00014 class Plugins_Wordpress_DB extends Common_DB
00015 {
00016     static protected $_message;
00017 
00018     /**
00019      * @return void
00020      */
00021     function __construct()
00022     {
00023         parent::__construct();
00024     }
00025 
00026     /**
00027      * @param array $post
00028      * @param integer $idUP
00029      * @return Message_Data
00030      */
00031     public static function save(array $post, $idUP)
00032     {
00033         $date = $post["dateCreated"];
00034         $publishDate = $date->year."-".$date->month."-".$date->day." ".$date->hour
00035         .":".$date->minute.":".$date->second;
00036 
00037         $data = array(
00038             "text" => $post["description"],
00039             "category" => $post["categories"],
00040             "tags" => $post["mt_keywords"],
00041             "comments" => $post["comments"],
00042             "fetched" => time()
00043         );
00044 
00045         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00046         self::$_message  = New Message_Data();
00047         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00048 
00049         self::$_message->setRemoteId($post["postid"])
00050                 ->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00051                 ->setIdUP($idUP);
00052 
00053         $existingMessages = $messageMapper->find(self::$_message);
00054         if (count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00055 
00056             self::$_message = $existingMessages[0];
00057         }
00058 
00059         self::$_message->setTitle($post["title"])
00060                 ->setPublishDate($publishDate)
00061                 ->setLink($post["link"])
00062                 ->setData(serialize($data))
00063                 ->setOwner("1");
00064 
00065         if (self::$_message->isValid()) {
00066 
00067             $id = $messageMapper->save(self::$_message);
00068             self::$_message->setId($id);
00069         }
00070 
00071         return self::$_message;
00072     }
00073 }
